coreAtributes.name: Double Fluff Sweater
coreAtributes.description: A long-sleeved sweater with an obscenely stretchy waist and plush interior, clearly built for the plumpest among us. Hangs loosely on skinny girls and boys, going past their knees and hanging very loosely over their hands. The tag insists you'll 'grow into it the fastest', whatever that means.

displacementText.playerNPCRough: You grab hold of [npc.name]'s sweater and roughly pull it off over [npc.her] head.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of your sweater and roughly pulls it off over your head.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of [npc2.name]'s sweater and roughly pulls it off over [npc2.her] head.

replacementText.playerNPC: You guide [npc.name]'s [npc.arms] through the sweater's sleeves as you pull it on [npc.herHim].
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You hold [npc.name] still as you roughly force the sweater down over [npc.her] head, before pulling it down over [npc.her] torso.
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] guides your [pc.arms] through the sweater's sleeves, before pulling it down over your torso.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] holds you still as [npc.she] roughly forces the sweater down over your head, before pushing your [pc.arms] through the sleeves.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.Name] guides [npc2.name]'s [npc2.arms] through the sweater's sleeves before pulling it down over [npc2.her] torso.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.Name] holds [npc2.name] still as [npc1.she] roughly forces the sweater down over [npc2.her] head, before pulling it down over [npc2.her] torso.

displacementText.playerSelf: You pull your sweater up to just below your chin.
displacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.Name] pulls [npc.her] sweater up to just below [npc.her] chin.

replacementText.playerSelf: You pull your sweater back down, covering your torso.
replacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.Name] pulls [npc.her] sweater back down to cover [npc.her] torso.
